entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 8:10 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
